attributes.action: Call on David Cameron to resign from his office in light of the  of the conclusion of the hacking trial
attributes.additional_details: In light of the conclusion of the hacking trial and the comments made by the judge in the trial who rebuked David Cameron for commenting on the conviction of Andy Coulson before the trial ended, the same judge who criticised the Prime Minister  for almost wrecking the £100m phone hacking trial. In light of all this we consider that he has brought his office as Prime Minister and head of government into such disrepute that he should do the only honorable thing and stand aside and resign from his office.
